declarations.description: `img-pan-zoom` Image pan zoom element Images are preloaded by `img-loader` and a spinner is shown until loaded Deep Zoom Images are supported ### Credits openSeadragon
declarations.name: ImgPanZoom

members.name: _setFullscreen
members.description: actually sets the fullscreen using API; can be overridden

members.name: rotateTo
members.description: sets rotation x degrees

members.name: rotate
members.description: rotates x degrees from current rotation

members.name: pan

parameters.description: of viewport height to pan vertically
parameters.name: fraction

members.description: pans x,y of viewport size from current position

members.name: zoomIn
members.description: amount to zoom in from current position

members.name: zoomOut
members.description: amount to zoom out from current position

members.name: toggleFullscreen
members.description: toggles fullscreen mode

members.name: toggleFlip
members.description: toggles flip mode

members.name: resetZoom
members.description: recenters image

members.name: page
members.description: if used with multiple images and paged navigation, index of current item

members.name: loading
members.description: loading

members.name: dzi
members.description: Set to true if you are using a deep zoom image

members.name: fadeIn
members.description: Fade in new items added to the viewer

members.name: hideSpinner
members.description: hides spinner

members.name: fullscreenToggled
members.description: whether fullscreen mode is toggled

members.name: flipToggled
members.description: whether images is flipped horizontally

members.name: showNavigationControl
members.description:
Set to false to prevent the appearance of the default
navigation controls. Note that if set to false, the customs buttons
set by the options zoomInButton, zoomOutButton etc, are rendered inactive.

members.name: showNavigator
members.description: Set to true to make the navigator minimap appear.

members.name: navigatorAutoFade
members.description: whether navigator fades when image is not longer being moved

members.name: navigatorPosition
members.description: where navigator is positioned: "TOP_LEFT", "BOTTOM_RIGHT", "ABSOLUTE", etc. Default is "TOP_RIGHT"

members.name: navigatorToggled
members.description: whether navigator window mode is toggled

members.name: zoomPerClick
members.description:
The "zoom distance" per mouse click or touch tap. Note:
Setting this to 1.0 effectively disables the click-to-zoom
feature (also see gestureSettings[Mouse|Touch|Pen].clickToZoom/dblClickToZoom).

members.name: zoomPerScroll
members.description:
The "zoom distance" per mouse scroll or touch pinch. Note:
Setting this to 1.0 effectively disables the mouse-wheel zoom
feature (also see gestureSettings[Mouse|Touch|Pen].scrollToZoom}).

members.name: animationTime
members.description:
Specifies the animation duration per each OpenSeadragon.Spring
which occur when the image is dragged or zoomed.

members.name: navPrevNextWrap
members.description:
If true then the 'previous' button will wrap to the last image
when viewing the first image and the 'next' button will wrap to the
first image when viewing the last image.

members.name: showRotationControl
members.description:
If true then the rotate left/right controls will be displayed as
part of the standard controls. This is also subject to the browser
support for rotate (e.g. viewer.drawer.canRotate()).

members.name: minZoomImageRatio
members.description:
The minimum percentage ( expressed as a number between 0 and 1 ) of
the viewport height or width at which the zoom out will be constrained.
Setting it to 0, for example will allow you to zoom out infinity.

members.name: maxZoomPixelRatio
members.description:
The maximum ratio to allow a zoom-in to affect the highest level
pixel ratio. This can be set to Infinity to allow 'infinite' zooming
into the image though it is less effective visually if the HTML5
Canvas is not availble on the viewing device.

members.name: constrainDuringPan
members.description: Constrain during pan

members.name: visibilityRatio
members.description:
The percentage ( as a number from 0 to 1 ) of the source image
which must be kept within the viewport. If the image is dragged
beyond that limit, it will 'bounce' back until the minimum
visibility ratio is achieved. Setting this to 0 and wrapHorizontal
( or wrapVertical ) to true will provide the effect of an infinitely
scrolling viewport.

members.name: sequenceMode
members.description: displays multiple images as a sequence

members.name: preserveViewport
members.description:
preserves viewport when navigating images in sequence mode
See https://openseadragon.github.io/examples/tilesource-sequence/

members.name: showReferenceStrip
members.description:
show reference strip for images in sequence mode.
See https://openseadragon.github.io/examples/ui-reference-strip/

members.name: referenceStripScroll
members.description: orientation of images using reference strip; can be 'horizontal' or 'vertical' (default)

members.name: src
members.description: image source

members.name: sources
members.description: array of image sources

members.name: describedBy
members.description: aria-describedby attribute

members.name: loaded
members.description: loaded

members.name: navigatorTop
members.description: if navigator position is "ABSOLUTE", top position for navigator

members.name: navigatorBottom
members.description: if navigator position is "ABSOLUTE", bottom position for navigator

members.name: navigatorLeft
members.description: if navigator position is "ABSOLUTE", left position for navigator

members.name: navigatorRight
members.description: if navigator position is "ABSOLUTE", right position for navigator

members.name: navigatorHeight
members.description: height of navigator

members.name: navigatorWidth
members.description: width of navigator

members.name: previousButton
members.description: id of custom previousButton

members.name: nextButton
members.description: id of custom nextButton

members.name: homeButton
members.description: id of custom homeButton

members.name: zoomInButton
members.description: id of custom zoomInButton

members.name: zoomOutButton
members.description: id of custom zoomInButton

members.name: fullScreenButton
members.description: id of custom zoomInButton

members.name: tag
members.description: convention

members.name: loaded
members.description: Read-only value that is true when the image is loaded.

members.name: error
members.description: Read-only value that indicates that the last set `src` failed to load.

members.name: loading
members.description:
Read-only value that tracks the loading state of the image when the `preload`
option is used.

members.name: describedBy
members.description: aria-describedby attribute
